content: आहरण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Taking away, robbing; as in अमृताहरणः. --णं {@--1@} Fetching, bringing (near); समिदाहरणाय प्रस्थिता वयं <ls>Ś. 1.</ls> {@--2@} Seizing, taking; <ls>R. 6. 75.</ls> {@--3@} Removing, extracting. {@--4@} Performing, accomplishing (as sacrifice); अश्वमेधस्य कौरव्य चकाराहरणे मतिं <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--5@} A dowry or present given to a bride (at the time of her marriage); सत्वानुरूपाहरणीकृतश्रीः <ls>R. 7. 32.</ls> {@--6@} Causing, inducing.
